title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Digital Communities
purpose: To promote the delivery of digitally equipped places that support and foster a connected, healthy, and productive community. This includes the creation and maintenance of sustainable digital infrastructure and providing residents with equal opportunity to thrive in a digital world.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 6104.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Archie Ratcliffe, Local Government Association. Tel: 07867 189 177
contact_details.secretariat: Local Government Association acts as the group's secretariat. https://www.local.gov.uk/
